pages.name: Ritual of the Feathered Knife
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.

Drains health from players in its area and puts the LP into a nearby blood altar.$(br2)$(#0000aa)Water Runes: 4$(br)$(#aaaa00)Air Runes: 8$(br)$(#aa0000)Fire Runes: 8$(br)$(#00aa00)Earth Runes: 16$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 40

Will Augmentations:$(br2)(Raw) Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total Will in the Aura.$(br)(Corrosive) Uses the player's Incense to increase the yield.$(br)(Destructive) Increases the yield of the ritual based on total Will.$(br)(Vengeful) Sets the minimum health for sacrificing to 10%. Overridden by Steadfast for the Owner if active.$(br)(Steadfast) Sets the minimum health for sacrificing from 30% to 70%.
